sourceMeaningMnemonic: If <radical>flowers</radical> are in the <radical>sun</radical> and they receive one <radical>drop</radical> and then another <radical>drop</radical> of water, they turn into a <kanji>strawberry</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine a sunny field full of flowers, which all combine into one enormous strawberry when two drops of water fall onto them. Two drops isn't much, so they have to work together to make the giant strawberry.
readingMnemonic: Believe it or not, a giant <kanji>strawberry</kanji> is the only cure for an <reading>itchy Go</reading>dzilla (<ja>いちご</ja>).
readingInfo: Imagine Godzilla, covered in an itchy rash, squishing the giant strawberry and rubbing it all over his body to calm his itchy skin.
